resume_generator.title: Resume Generator
resume_generator.description: Create a professional resume using AI

steps.title: Gather Your Info
steps.description: Collect your work experience, education, and skills. You'll need: last 3 jobs, achievements, certifications, and key skills.
steps.tips: Copy-paste from LinkedIn or your old resume. Include specific numbers: revenue, team size, % improvement.

steps.title: Input Your Background
steps.description: Feed your information into the AI prompt. The system will parse and organize it.
steps.tips: Be detailed with accomplishments. Use numbers and metrics instead of vague descriptions.

steps.title: Generate Resume
steps.description: Run the AI generator. It will create multiple resume variations optimized for ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems).
steps.tips: Run 2-3 variations and pick the one that highlights your best achievements.

steps.title: Edit & Personalize
steps.description: Customize the output for your target job. Adjust keywords and emphasis based on job description.
steps.tips: Copy the job description keywords into your resume to improve ATS score.

steps.title: Export & Apply
steps.description: Download your resume as PDF and start applying to jobs.
steps.tips: Use this for 10+ applications to maximize chances. Track which version gets most interviews.

whatsapp_bot.title: WhatsApp Automation Bot
whatsapp_bot.description: Build a WhatsApp bot that automates customer interactions

steps.title: Set Up WhatsApp Business API
steps.description: Create a Meta Business Account and configure WhatsApp API credentials.
steps.tips: This takes 2-3 days for approval. Do this first and come back when approved.

steps.title: Design Your Automation Flows
steps.description: Plan what messages to send and when. Example: greet → ask question → send offer → follow up.
steps.tips: Keep flows short. Most people ignore long messages. Use quick replies.

steps.title: Code Your Bot Logic
steps.description: Write or configure bot code using the provided templates. Connect to your CRM if you have one.
steps.tips: Start simple: greeting + FAQ answers. Add complexity later.

steps.title: Test & Deploy
steps.description: Test all flows with friends. Deploy to production. Monitor responses.
steps.tips: Test edge cases: typos, unexpected inputs, long waits between messages.

prompt_selling.title: Sell AI Prompts
prompt_selling.description: Create and sell high-value AI prompts online

steps.title: Brainstorm Prompt Ideas
steps.description: Find problems people pay to solve: content creation, email writing, code generation, marketing copy, etc.
steps.tips: Check Gumroad, Payhip, Etsy to see what's selling. Find gaps.

steps.title: Write & Test Prompts
steps.description: Create detailed prompts. Test them with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini to ensure they work consistently.
steps.tips: Include variables [VARIABLES] so buyers can customize. Test 5+ times with different inputs.

steps.title: Create Landing Page
steps.description: Build a simple sales page describing the prompt benefit. Include examples of output.
steps.tips: Show before/after: bad prompt vs your prompt. Use your landing page tool or Carrd.

steps.title: Set Up Payment
steps.description: Use Gumroad, Payhip, or Stripe to handle payments. Price at $5-50 depending on value.
steps.tips: Start at $9-19. Increase price as demand grows. Bundle related prompts.

steps.title: Launch to Audience
steps.description: Share in forums, Twitter, LinkedIn, newsletters. Get 10+ sales to validate demand.
steps.tips: Post genuine success stories. Share your process. Be authentic.

steps.title: Iterate & Scale
steps.description: Based on feedback, improve prompts or create new ones. Aim for $500+/mo per prompt.
steps.tips: Track which prompts sell best. Double down on winners.
